title: FS: Last of my Raw T206 Detroit Tigers (all SOLD)
author: HexsHeroes

posts.post_title: FS: Last of my Raw T206 Detroit Tigers (all SOLD)
posts.post_content:
FS: Last of my Raw T206 Detroit Tigers ***all sold***

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I believe these are the last of the T206 cards I own.
  
Assorted raw Detroit Tigers T206 cards. Nearly all of these cards are crease-free, with few (if any) marks. Just honest corner wear.

Chas. O'Leary - Portrait, Piedmont  . . . . . . . . light crease top middle edge to edge 1/4" below right top corner . . . . . . $ 30  ***SOLD***
Chas. Schmidt - Throwing, Sweet Caporal . . . light tobacco staining on reverse, otherwise decent . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 35  ***SOLD***  
Chas. Schmidt - Portrait, Piedmont . . . . . . . .crease/loss paper front bottom left corner, miscut . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  $ 35  ***SOLD***
Bill Donovan - Throwing, Piedmont . . . . . . . . #74 written in pencil on reverse, otherwise pretty decent. . . . . . . . . . . $ 35  ***SOLD***
Claude Rossman, Piedmont  . . . . . . . . . . . . . Heavy horizontal creases through middle of card  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 20  ***SOLD***


Orders totaling $100 or more, ship free.

All other orders, please add $5.00 towards shipping via USPS Priority Mail.

I would prefer payment via Paypal Family & Friends, but would accept check or money order (which must clear before I ship).

First person to contact me stating which card(s) they will take, and pays, gets it/them.

You will get the exact card(s) pictured.

Please note: I will not accept returns nor issue refunds. Cards will be packaged for delivery with help of postal worker.

Thanks
Vincent
.
.

I’ll take Donovan
